DOC.brief_summary: Long-term objective basic research part improvement CAP-management respect therapy , diagnosis prevention contribute well care patient pneumonia .
DOC.detailed_description: Long-term objective basic research part improvement CAP-management respect therapy , diagnosis prevention contribute well care patient pneumonia . The aim study CAPNETZ improve diagnosis , treatment patient care .
DOC.criteria: age ≥ 18 infiltrate chest Xray Inclusion criterion : cough production purulent sputum pathologic lung auscultation ( crackle ) fever hospital inpatient treatment within last 28 day Immune suppress patient
